good_job_moving_on: Good job! Let's move on to the next word.
file_upload_error: Error uploading files. Please try again.
result_very_low: Keep trying until you get the words right.
result_low: Not bad, but you still need more practice.
result_medium: This is an okay result, but you need more practice.
result_high: Good result! You can reach higher.
